amendment.description: To clarify the jurisdiction of the Select Committee on Intelligence.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4030 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4030 proposed by Senator Rockefeller to Amendment SA 3981. (consideration: CR S10661-10662) To clarify the jurisdiction of the Select Committee on Intelligence.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4030 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4030 proposed by Senator Rockefeller to Amendment SA 3981.
